member.summary: A dictionary of weak references, akin to a . When a key or value is disposed, its corresponding pair is automatically removed.

The type for the values of this dictionary; Can be a reference or value type.

member.name: T:ModLib.CompatibilityManager
member.summary: Simple helper for determining the presence of other mods and ensure mod compatibility.

member.name: M:ModLib.CompatibilityManager.Clear
member.summary: Clears the internal dictionary of cached mods.

member.name: M:ModLib.CompatibilityManager.IsModEnabled(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines if a given mod is currently enabled.
member.param: The ID of the mod to check for.
If true, ignores any previously cached result and queries for the mod's ID directly.
member.returns: true if the given mod was found to be enabled, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.CompatibilityManager.IsFakeAchievementsEnabled(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines if the Fake AChievements mod is enabled.
member.param: If true, ignores any previously cached result and queries for Rain Meadow's ID directly.
member.returns: true if the mod is enabled, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.CompatibilityManager.IsIICEnabled(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines if either Improved Input Config or Improved Input Config: Extended are enabled.
member.param: If true, ignores any previously cached result and queries for IIC's ID directly.
member.returns: true if one of these mods is enabled, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.CompatibilityManager.IsRainMeadowEnabled(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines if the Rain Meadow mod is enabled.
member.param: If true, ignores any previously cached result and queries for Rain Meadow's ID directly.
member.returns: true if the mod is enabled, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.CompatibilityManager.SetModCompatibility(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Overrides the configured compatibility features for a given mod.
member.param: The identifier of the mod.
Whether or not compatibility with the given mod should be enabled.

member.name: M:ModLib.CompatibilityManager.ConfigLoader.Initialize(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Initializes the with the provided list of paths to config files.
member.param: The list of paths to config files for mod IDs.

member.name: M:ModLib.CompatibilityManager.ConfigLoader.CheckModCompats(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String[]})
member.summary: Queries the client's list of enabled mods for toggling compatibility features.
member.param: The list of mod IDs to be queried.

member.name: T:ModLib.Extras
member.summary: A collection of utilities and wrappers for common modding activities.

member.name: P:ModLib.Extras.GameSession
member.summary: The current game session of the player, if any.

member.name: P:ModLib.Extras.IsMeadowEnabled
member.summary: Whether or not the Rain Meadow mod is present. This value is cached for performance purposes.

member.name: P:ModLib.Extras.IsIICEnabled
member.summary: Whether or not the Improved Input Config: Extended mod is present. This value is cached for performance purposes.

member.name: P:ModLib.Extras.IsFakeAchievementsEnabled
member.summary: Whether or not the Fake Achievements mod is present. This value is cached for performance purposes.

member.name: P:ModLib.Extras.IsOnlineSession
member.summary: If the current game session is in an online lobby.

member.name: P:ModLib.Extras.IsMultiplayer
member.summary: If the current game session is in a multiplayer context (online or local).
member.remarks: To determine if the given session is online or not, use .

member.name: P:ModLib.Extras.IsHostPlayer
member.summary: If the player is the host of the current game session. On Singleplayer, this is always true.

member.name: P:ModLib.Extras.InGameSession
member.summary: If the player is currently in-game and not on the main menu.

member.name: P:ModLib.Extras.LogUtilsAvailable
member.summary: Determines if LogUtils is currently loaded and available for usage.

member.name: P:ModLib.Extras.ModLibAvailable
member.summary: Determines if ModLib is currently loaded and available for usage.

member.name: P:ModLib.Extras.DebugMode
member.summary: Determines if Dev Tools is currently enabled, or was enabled last time ModLib was active. Usable even before ModManager is available, but might be innacurate on the first time the mod is run.

member.name: M:ModLib.Extras.GrantFakeAchievement(System.String)
member.summary: Grants and displays a given custom achievement to the client. If the Fake Achievements mod is not present, this method does nothing.
member.param: The resolvable identifier of the achievement.

member.name: M:ModLib.Extras.RevokeFakeAchievement(System.String)
member.summary: Revokes a given custom achievement for the client. If the Fake Achievements mod is not present, this method does nothing.
member.param: The resolvable identifier of the achievement.

member.name: M:ModLib.Extras.IsLocalObject(PhysicalObject)
member.summary: Safely determines if the given object is owned by the player in an online context.
member.param: The object for testing.
member.returns: true if the given object is owned by this client, false otherwise. This method returns true if Rain Meadow is not enabled, or if the player is not in an online lobby.

member.name: M:ModLib.Extras.WrapAction(System.Action)
member.summary: Wraps a given action in a try-catch, safely performing its code while handling potential exceptions.
member.param: The action to be executed.

member.name: T:ModLib.Input.InputHandler
member.summary: General interface for managing keybinds and retrieving player input.

member.name: M:ModLib.Input.InputHandler.GetRawInput(Player)
member.summary: Retrieves the raw input package for the given player.
member.param: The player whose input will be queried.
member.returns: A containing the input for the given player.

member.name: M:ModLib.Input.InputHandler.GetRawInput(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the raw input package for the given player index.
member.param: The player index whose input will be queried.
member.returns: A containing the input for the given player index.

member.name: M:ModLib.Input.InputHandler.IsKeyDown(Player,ModLib.Input.Keybind,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines whether a given keybind is currently being held by the player.
member.param: The player itself.
The keybind to be checked.
If true, input will be evaluated even if Slugcat itself cannot receive inputs (e.g. when dead or in cutscene mode).
member.returns: true if the keybind's key is currently being held, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Input.InputHandler.IsKeyDown(System.Int32,ModLib.Input.Keybind,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines whether a given keybind is currently being held by the player with the provided index.
member.remarks: Unlike its extension variant, this method makes no checking if the player is able to receive input, and may return true even if their character is dead or incapacitated.
member.param: The index of the player.
The keybind to be checked.
If true, input will be evaluated even if Slugcat itself cannot receive inputs (e.g. when dead or in cutscene mode).
member.returns: true if the keybind's key is currently being held, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Input.InputHandler.WasKeyJustPressed(Player,ModLib.Input.Keybind,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines whether a given keybind has just been pressed by the player.
member.param: The player itself.
The keybind to be checked.
If true, input will be evaluated even if Slugcat itself cannot receive inputs (e.g. when dead or in cutscene mode).
member.returns: true if the keybind's key was just pressed, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Input.InputHandler.WasKeyJustPressed(System.Int32,ModLib.Input.Keybind,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines whether a given keybind has just been pressed by the player with the provided index.
member.param: The index of the player.
The keybind to be checked.
If true, input will be evaluated even if Slugcat itself cannot receive inputs (e.g. when dead or in cutscene mode).
member.returns: true if the keybind's key was just pressed, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Input.InputHandler.ToggleInputListener(System.Int32)
member.summary: Enables or disables input handling for non-player objects. If enabled, a can be retrieved from the player's index to obtain their current input.
member.remarks: This requires the Improved Input Config: Extended mod to work, and will do nothing otherwise.
member.param: The player index to be checked.

member.name: T:ModLib.Input.Keybind
member.summary: An immutable representation of a player keybind, compatible with ImprovedInput's PlayerKeybind object.

member.name: P:ModLib.Input.Keybind.Keybinds
member.summary: Returns a read-only list of all registered keybinds.
member.returns: A read-only list of all registered keybinds.

member.name: P:ModLib.Input.Keybind.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of this Keybind.

member.name: P:ModLib.Input.Keybind.Mod
member.summary: The name of the mod this Keybind belongs to.

member.name: P:ModLib.Input.Keybind.Name
member.summary: The user-friendly name of this Keybind.

member.name: P:ModLib.Input.Keybind.KeyboardPreset
member.summary: The KeyCode to be used for detecting inputs with a keyboard.

member.name: P:ModLib.Input.Keybind.GamepadPreset
member.summary: The KeyCode to be used for detecting inputs with a gamepad.

member.name: P:ModLib.Input.Keybind.XboxPreset
member.summary: The KeyCode to be used for detecting inputs with an xbox.

member.name: M:ModLib.Input.Keybind.IsDown(System.Int32,Player)
member.summary: Determines whether this keybind is currently being pressed.
member.param: The player index whose input will be queried.
The actual player instance whose inputs are being queried. If specified, input will be ignored while the player is unconscious/dead or in a cutscene.
member.returns: true if this keybind's bound key is being held, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Input.Keybind.JustPressed(System.Int32,Player)
member.summary: Determines whether this keybind has just been pressed.
member.param: The player index whose input will be queried.
The actual player instance whose inputs are being queried. If specified, input will be ignored while the player is unconscious/dead or in a cutscene.
member.returns: true if this keybind's bound key was just pressed, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Input.Keybind.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the Keybind object.
member.returns: A string that represents the Keybind object.

member.name: M:ModLib.Input.Keybind.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the Keybind with the given identifier.
member.param: The identifier of the Keybind to be retrieved.
member.returns: The object whose Id matches the provided argument, or null if none is found.

member.name: M:ModLib.Input.Keybind.Register(System.String,System.String,UnityEngine.KeyCode,UnityEngine.KeyCode,UnityEngine.KeyCode)
member.summary: Registers a new Keybind with the provided arguments.
member.remarks: If the Improved Input: Extended mod is present, an equivalent PlayerKeybind is also registered to the game.

param.name: id
param.para: The identifier of this keybind. Must be an unique string not used by any other mod, or yourself.
If omitted, an unique identifier is generated with the format "{ModId}.{KeybindName}"

member.param: The name of the new Keybind. Will be displayed for players with IIC:E enabled.
The key code for usage by keyboard devices.
The key code for usage by gamepad input devices.
The key code for usage by Xbox input devices.
member.returns: The registered object.

member.name: M:ModLib.Input.Keybind.op_Implicit(ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind)~ModLib.Input.Keybind
member.summary: Retrieves the equivalent Keybind object of a PlayerKeybind instance. If none is found, a new Keybind is registered using the PlayerKeybind's values as arguments.
member.param: The PlayerKeybind object to be converted.

member.name: M:ModLib.Input.Keybind.op_Implicit(ModLib.Input.Keybind)~ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind
member.summary: Retrieves the equivalent PlayerKeybind object registered with the Keybind instance. If none is found, a new PlayerKeybind is registered using the Keybind's values as arguments.
member.param: The Keybind object to be converted.

member.name: T:ModLib.Loader.Entrypoint
member.summary: ModLib's entrypoint for initializing core systems and being available for usage as early as possible.
member.remarks: This is an internal class of ModLib, exposed for usage by extension assemblies. Unless working strictly in that context, you should not access this class or any of its members directly.

member.name: P:ModLib.Loader.Entrypoint.IsInitialized
member.summary: Whether or not ModLib was successfully initialized.

member.name: E:ModLib.Loader.Entrypoint.PreInitialize
member.summary: Invoked just before ModLib starts its initialization process.

member.name: E:ModLib.Loader.Entrypoint.OnInitialize
member.summary: Invoked after ModLib finishes initializing.

member.name: E:ModLib.Loader.Entrypoint.PreDisable
member.summary: Invoked just before ModLib starts its shutdown process.

member.name: E:ModLib.Loader.Entrypoint.OnDisable
member.summary: Invoked after ModLib has been disabled.

member.name: M:ModLib.Loader.Entrypoint.Initialize(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Initializes ModLib and loads its resources into the game.
member.remarks: This is an internal method of ModLib, exposed for usage by ModLib.Loader. Unless working within that context, you should not call this function.
member.param: The list of paths to config files, retrieved during the preloading process.
The compiler-provided file path to the calling method.

member.name: M:ModLib.Loader.Entrypoint.Disable
member.summary: Disables ModLib and removes its resources from the game.

member.name: M:ModLib.Loader.Entrypoint.InitializeCompatManager(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String},BepInEx.Logging.ManualLogSource,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes compatibility checking with the provided paths to config files.
member.param: The list of paths to config files, retrieved during the preloader process.
The logger for usage by this method.
Whether or not this is a forced initalization. If the caller is not ModLib's Loader, this should always be true.
The provided file path to the calling method.

member.name: T:ModLib.Loader.ModLibExtensionAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a given class is the entrypoint for a ModLib extension assembly. This class cannot be inherited.

member.summary: A logger type which logs to a custom file with basic formatting and timestamps.

member.summary: A wrapper around an instance, where logs are only processed if they meet a minimal threshold logging level.
member.param: The logger instance to be wrapped.
The max log level allowed for logging.

member.name: M:ModLib.Logging.FilteredLogWrapper.#ctor(ModLib.Logging.ModLogger,BepInEx.Logging.LogLevel)
member.summary: A wrapper around an instance, where logs are only processed if they meet a minimal threshold logging level.
member.param: The logger instance to be wrapped.
The max log level allowed for logging.

member.name: P:ModLib.Logging.FilteredLogWrapper.MaxLogLevel
member.summary: The max "priority" level allowed for logging; Any message whose level is lower than this will be ignored.

member.name: M:ModLib.Logging.FilteredLogWrapper.#ctor(ModLib.Logging.ModLogger)
member.summary: Creates a log wrapper with ModLib's default logging verbosity settings; All logs of type Debug or lower are ignored, unless in Debug Mode.
member.param: The logger instance to be wrapped.

member.name: M:ModLib.Logging.FilteredLogWrapper.Log(BepInEx.Logging.LogLevel,System.Object)
member.remarks: This method will only process log requests if is of equal importance or higher than the max allowed.

member.name: M:ModLib.Logging.FilteredLogWrapper.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representing the current object and its wrapped instance.
member.returns: A string representing the current object and its wrapped instance.

member.name: T:ModLib.Logging.LoggingAdapter
member.summary: Intermediary helper for creating loggers with the appropriate logging backend.

member.name: M:ModLib.Logging.LoggingAdapter.CreateLogger(BepInEx.Logging.ManualLogSource,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a logger instance employing a safe encapsulation technique.
member.param: The BepInEx source to use for identification and logging.
If true, the generated logger will be a , which ignores certain logs based on their level and the current type of ModLib's build.

member.summary: Wrapper class for a LogUtils logger instance.

member.summary: Wrapper class for a LogUtils logger instance.

member.summary: Wrapper enum for representing potential types.

member.summary: The current online lobby's game mode is of type .

member.summary: The current online lobby's game mode is of type .

member.name: F:ModLib.Meadow.MeadowGameModes.Arena
member.summary: The current online lobby's game mode is of type .

member.name: F:ModLib.Meadow.MeadowGameModes.Custom
member.summary: The current online lobby's game mode is of an unknown type (possibly another mod's custom game mode).

member.name: T:ModLib.Meadow.MeadowHooks
member.summary: Rain Meadow-specific hooks and events, which are only enabled when the mod itself is present.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.MeadowHooks.AddHooks
member.summary: Applies all Rain Meadow-specific hooks to the game.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.MeadowHooks.RemoveHooks
member.summary: Removes all Rain Meadow-specific hooks from the game.

member.name: T:ModLib.Meadow.MeadowUtils
member.summary: Utilities for retrieving and evaluating data exclusive to the Rain Meadow mod.

remarks.para: Warning: Always ensure Rain Meadow is enabled before using this class!
Properties and methods like , , and can all be used/queried before accessing any of this class's members. Otherwise, a will be thrown, even if the given member does not have any Meadow-specific code.

member.name: E:ModLib.Meadow.MeadowUtils.JoinedGameSession
member.summary: Invoked when the player first joins an online game session (not the lobby itself).

member.name: P:ModLib.Meadow.MeadowUtils.IsOnline
member.summary: Determines if the current game session is an online lobby.

member.name: P:ModLib.Meadow.MeadowUtils.IsHost
member.summary: Determines if this player is the host of an online session. On singleplayer, this is always true.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.MeadowUtils.IsMine(PhysicalObject)
member.summary: Determines if the given physical object belongs to the client.
member.remarks: If the current game session is not online, this always returns true.
member.param: The object itself.
member.returns: true if the physical object belongs to this client (or the current game session is not online), false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.MeadowUtils.GetOnlineName(Player)
member.summary: Obtains the online name of the given player.
member.param: The player to be queried.
member.returns: A String containing the player's name, or null if none is found.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.MeadowUtils.GetAvatars(RainMeadow.OnlinePlayer)
member.summary: Obtains all avatars tied to the given ; Actual types of the retrieved creatures may vary with game mode.
member.param: The online player whose avatars will be queried for.
member.returns: A list of creatures controlled by the online player, or null if none is found.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.MeadowUtils.LogSystemMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Logs a message to Rain Meadow's chat (as the system) for all online players.
member.param: The contents of the message to be sent.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.MeadowUtils.IsGameMode(ModLib.Meadow.MeadowGameModes)
member.summary: Determines if the current online game session is of the given game mode type. If not online, this is always false.
member.param: The gamemode to be tested for.
member.returns: true if the current game session is both online and of the given game mode type; false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.MeadowUtils.RequestOwnership(PhysicalObject)
member.summary: Requests the owner of a given realized object for its ownership.
member.remarks: Use this overload when running code in an environment where Rain Meadow may or may not be enabled.
member.param: The realized object whose ownership will be requested.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.MeadowUtils.RequestOwnership(PhysicalObject,System.Action{RainMeadow.GenericResult})
member.summary: Requests the owner of a given realized object for its ownership, then runs a given callback method after resolving the request.
member.param: The realized object whose ownership will be requested.
The callback method to be executed after resolving the request.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.MeadowUtils.RequestOwnership(RainMeadow.OnlinePhysicalObject,System.Action{RainMeadow.GenericResult})
member.summary: Requests the owner of a given online object for its ownership, then optionally runs a callback method after resolving the request.
member.param: The online object whose ownership will be requested.
The optional callback method to be executed after resolving the request.

member.name: T:ModLib.Meadow.ModRPCManager
member.summary: A simple tracker of sent RPC events, used to prevent unresolved SoftRPCs from hanging around indefinitely.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.ModRPCManager.ClearRPCs
member.summary: Clears all unresolved RPCs from the manager.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.ModRPCManager.UpdateRPCs
member.summary: Updates all pending instances, removing them on expiration.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.ModRPCManager.SendRPCEvent``1(RainMeadow.OnlinePlayer,``0,System.Object[])
member.summary: Sends an RPC event to the online player, which is automatically aborted if the recipient does not answer after a certain time limit.
member.typeparam: The type of the RPC delegate to be sent.
member.param: The recipient who will receive this RPC event.
The RPC method to be sent.
Any arguments of the RPC method.
member.returns: The instance sent to the online player.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.ModRPCManager.BroadcastOnceRPCInRoom(RainMeadow.OnlineEntity,System.Delegate,System.Object[])
member.summary: Sends a single RPC event to all players in the same room as the online entity.
member.param: The online entity who will send the RPC events.
The RPC method to be sent.
Any arguments of the RPC method.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.ModRPCManager.ResolveRPCEvent(RainMeadow.GenericResult)
member.summary: Logs the result of the resolved RPC event, then removes its timeout irrespective of its result.
member.param: The result of the resolved RPC event.

member.name: T:ModLib.Meadow.ModRPCManager.RPCTimeout
member.summary: A self-contained timer which automatically aborts a given RPC once its internal timer runs out.
member.param: The RPC event this timeout is tied to.
The duration of the internal timer.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.ModRPCManager.RPCTimeout.#ctor(RainMeadow.RPCEvent,System.Int32)
member.summary: A self-contained timer which automatically aborts a given RPC once its internal timer runs out.
member.param: The RPC event this timeout is tied to.
The duration of the internal timer.

member.name: T:ModLib.Meadow.ModRPCs
member.summary: Events sent to and received by clients, used for syncing data in an online context.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.ModRPCs.LogSystemMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the provided system message to the player's chat.
member.param: The message to be displayed

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.ModRPCs.RequestSyncRemixOptions(RainMeadow.RPCEvent,RainMeadow.OnlinePlayer)
member.summary: Requests the owner of the current lobby to sync their REMIX options with this client.
member.param: The RPC event itself.
The player who called this event.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.ModRPCs.SyncRemixOptions(RainMeadow.RPCEvent,ModLib.Meadow.ModRPCs.SerializableOptions)
member.summary: Overrides the player's local instance with the host's own REMIX options.
member.param: The RPC event itself.
The serializable values of the host's instance.

member.name: T:ModLib.Meadow.ModRPCs.SerializableOptions
member.summary: A serializable wrapper around a ' local options dictionary.

member.name: F:ModLib.Meadow.ModRPCs.SerializableOptions.Options
member.summary: The internally held option values;

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.ModRPCs.SerializableOptions.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,ModLib.Options.ConfigValue})
member.summary: Creates a new instance with the provided options for serialization.
member.remarks: Options prefixed with an underscore (_) are ignored for serialization purposes.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.ModRPCs.SerializableOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance with an empty options dictionary for serialization.

member.name: M:ModLib.Meadow.ModRPCs.SerializableOptions.CustomSerialize(RainMeadow.Serializer)
member.summary: Serializes or de-serializes the referenced local options, using the provided serializer object.

member.name: T:ModLib.ModPlugin
member.summary: A BaseUnityPlugin skeleton for quick prototyping and development.
member.remarks: Notice: All visible methods are virtual, and may be overriden to load your mod's assets and hooks into the game.

member.name: F:ModLib.ModPlugin.Options
member.summary: The REMIX option interface registered for this mod, if any. This field is read-only.

member.name: P:ModLib.ModPlugin.IsModEnabled
member.summary: Determines if this mod has successfuly been enabled.

member.name: P:ModLib.ModPlugin.ResourcesLoaded
member.summary: Determines if LoadResources has been successfully called during initialization.

member.name: P:ModLib.ModPlugin.Logger
member.summary: The custom logger instance for this mod.

member.name: P:ModLib.ModPlugin.LogSource
member.summary: The inherited from by this mod.

member.name: M:ModLib.ModPlugin.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new ModPlugin instance with no REMIX option interface.

member.name: M:ModLib.ModPlugin.#ctor(OptionInterface)
member.summary: Creates a new ModPlugin instance with the provided REMIX option interface.
member.param: The mod's REMIX option interface class, if any.

member.name: M:ModLib.ModPlugin.#ctor(OptionInterface,ModLib.Logging.ModLogger)
member.summary: Creates a new ModPlugin instance with the provided REMIX option interface and logger instance.
member.param: The mod's REMIX option interface class, if any.
The logger instance to be used. If null, a new one is created and assigned to this mod.

member.name: M:ModLib.ModPlugin.OnEnable
member.summary: Applies hooks to the game, then marks the mod as enabled. Override this to add behavior which should only occur once, while your mod is being loaded by the game.

member.name: M:ModLib.ModPlugin.OnDisable
member.summary: Removes hooks from the game, then marks the mod as disabled. Override this to run behavior which should occur when your mod is disabled/reloaded by the game.
member.remarks: This is most useful for Rain Reloader compatibility, but also seems to be called by the base game on exit.

member.name: M:ModLib.ModPlugin.LoadResources
member.summary:
Load any resources, such as sprites or sounds. This also registers the mod's REMIX interface to the game.
Override this to add behavior which must run exactly once, and only after all mods have been loaded into the game.

member.name: M:ModLib.ModPlugin.ApplyHooks
member.summary: Applies this mod's hooks to the game.

member.name: M:ModLib.ModPlugin.RemoveHooks
member.summary: Removes this mod's hooks from the game.

member.name: M:ModLib.ModPlugin.OnModsInitHook(On.RainWorld.orig_OnModsInit,RainWorld)
member.summary: Loads this mod's resources to the game. For adding your own behavior, override instead.

member.name: T:ModLib.Options.ConfigValue
member.summary: A holder of supported values for options.

member.name: P:ModLib.Options.ConfigValue.Kind
member.summary: Determines the internally held type of this object.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ConfigValue.#ctor(System.ValueType)
member.summary: Creates a new configurable value holding the provided value type.
member.param: The value type to be stored. Must be an integer, float, or boolean.
member.exception: The provided value type is not one of the above supported types.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ConfigValue.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new configurable value holding the provided string object.
member.param: The string to be stored.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ConfigValue.FromObject(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a new configurable value holding the provided object.
member.param: The object to be stored. Must be either an integer, float, boolean or string.
member.returns: The newly created instance.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ConfigValue.GetBoxedValue
member.summary: Retrieves a boxed representation of the internal value stored by this instance.
member.returns: The boxed internally held value of this instance, or null if none is found.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ConfigValue.IsNumeric
member.summary: Determines if the internally held value is of a numeric type.
member.returns: true if the internally held value is of a numeric type, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ConfigValue.TryGetInt(System.Int32@)
member.summary: Attempts to retrieve a stored integer from the configurable object, if there is any.
member.param: The retrieved value, or 0 if none is found.
member.returns: true if the internally held value is of type , false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ConfigValue.TryGetFloat(System.Single@)
member.summary: Attempts to retrieve a stored float from the configurable object, if there is any.
member.param: The retrieved value, or 0.0F if none is found.
member.returns: true if the internally held value is of type , false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ConfigValue.TryGetBool(System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Attempts to retrieve a stored boolean from the configurable object, if there is any.
member.param: The retrieved value, or false if none is found.
member.returns: true if the internally held value is of type , false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ConfigValue.TryGetString(System.String@)
member.summary: Attempts to retrieve a stored string from the configurable object, if there is any.
member.param: The retrieved value, or null if none is found.
member.returns: true if the internally held value is of type , false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ConfigValue.TryGetNumber(System.ValueType@)
member.summary: Attempts to retrieve a stored number from the configurable object, if there is any.
member.param: The retrieved value (either an int or float), or null if none is found.
member.returns: true if the internally held value is of a numeric type, false otherwise.

member.summary: Attempts to retrieve a value-type object of the given type from the provided field.
member.typeparam: The type of the value to be retrieved.
member.param: The kind of the value type to be retrieved. If this instance's does not match this argument, the default value for is returned.
The field whose value will be retrieved.
The output value from this operation.
member.returns: The value of if matches the instance's value, or the default value for otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ConfigValue.TryGetNullable``1(ModLib.Options.ConfigValue.ValueKind,``0@,``0@)
member.summary: Attempts to retrieve a reference-type object of the given type from the provided field.
member.typeparam: The type of the value to be retrieved.
member.param: The kind of the reference type to be retrieved. If this instance's does not match this argument, null is instead returned.
The field whose value will be retrieved.
The output value from this operation.
member.returns: The value of if matches the instance's value, or null otherwise.

member.summary: Returns the string representation of the internally held value by this instance.
member.returns: The string representation of the internally held value by this instance.

member.name: T:ModLib.Options.OptionBuilder
member.summary: Helper class for building OpTabs with a variety of chain-able methods.
member.remarks: To return the generated OpTab object, use .

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.OptionBuilder.#ctor(Menu.Remix.MixedUI.OpTab)
member.summary: Helper class for building OpTabs with a variety of chain-able methods.
member.remarks: To return the generated OpTab object, use .

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.OptionBuilder.#ctor(OptionInterface,System.String,UnityEngine.Color[])
member.summary: Initializes a new OptionBuilder instance for creating option tabs.
member.param: The OptionInterface who will own the resulting OpTab instance.
The name of the tab itself, displayed on the left side of the menu; Only visible with two or more tabs.
The color values to be used by the OpTab instance. Colors are retrieved by index and applied to relevant fields in alphabetical order.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.OptionBuilder.Build
member.summary: Returns the generated OpTab object with the applied options of previous methods.
member.returns: The generated OpTab instance.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.OptionBuilder.AddCheckBoxOption(System.String,Configurable{System.Boolean},Menu.Remix.MixedUI.OpLabel@,Menu.Remix.MixedUI.OpCheckBox@,UnityEngine.Color[])
member.summary: Adds a new OpCheckBox to the OpTab instance, with a descriptive OpLabel after it.
member.param: The check box's label. Will be displayed right after the box itself.
The Configurable this check box will be bound to.
The generated OpLabel for this option.
The generated OpCheckBox for this option.
The color values to be used by the OpLabel and OpCheckBox instance. Colors are retrieved by index and applied to relevant fields in alphabetical order.
member.returns: The OptionBuilder object.

member.summary: Adds a new OpComboBox to the OpTab instance, with a descriptive OpLabel after it.
member.param: The combo box's label. Will be displayed right after the box itself.
The Configurable this combo box will be bound to.
The generated OpLabel for this option.
The generated OpComboBox for this option.
The width of the combo box element.
The color values to be used by the OpLabel and OpComboBox instance. Colors are retrieved by index and applied to relevant fields in alphabetical order.
member.returns: The OptionBuilder object.

member.summary: Adds a new OpSlider to the OpTab instance, with a descriptive OpLabel before it.
member.param: The slider's label. Will be displayed right before the slider itself.
The Configurable this slider will be bound to.
The generated OpLabel for this option.
The generated OpSlider for this option.
A multiplier for the slider's size.
If this slider should be vertical.
The color values to be used by the OpLabel and OpSlider instance. Colors are retrieved by index and applied to relevant fields in alphabetical order.
member.returns: The OptionBuilder object.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.OptionBuilder.AddFloatSliderOption(System.String,Configurable{System.Single},Menu.Remix.MixedUI.OpLabel@,Menu.Remix.MixedUI.OpFloatSlider@,System.Int32,System.Byte,System.Boolean,UnityEngine.Color[])

The generated OpLabel for this option.
The generated OpFloatSlider for this option.
The length of the slider itself.
If this slider should be vertical.
The color values to be used by the OpLabel and OpFloatSlider instance. Colors are retrieved by index and applied to relevant fields in alphabetical order.
member.returns: The OptionBuilder object.

member.summary: Adds extra space before the next object added.

member.returns: The OptionBuilder object.

The size of the label element.

If this text should be rendered larger than usual.

member.summary: Adds one or more objects to the OpTab instance.

member.returns: The OptionBuilder object.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.OptionBuilder.GetColorOrDefault(UnityEngine.Color[],System.Int32,UnityEngine.Color)
member.summary: Retrieves a color from the given array, a fallback if provided, or the default Rain World color for menu elements (rgbMediumGrey) if neither are provided.

A fallback color to use if the given index does not have a value.

member.name: T:ModLib.Options.OptionUtils
member.summary: Utility methods for retrieving the mod's REMIX options.
member.remarks: This also allows for overriding the player's local options without touching their REMIX values.

member.name: P:ModLib.Options.OptionUtils.SharedOptions
member.summary: The client's local instance, overriden when joining an online lobby.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.OptionUtils.GetClientOptionValue``1(Configurable{``0})
member.summary: Directly requests for the client's REMIX options, then retrieves its value.
member.remarks: This should only be used for options which are not synced by Options.ServerOptions
member.typeparam: The type of the configurable itself.
member.param: The option to be queried.
member.returns: The configured value for the given option.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.OptionUtils.IsClientOptionEnabled(Configurable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Directly requests for the client's REMIX options, then determines whether it is enabled or not.
member.remarks: This should only be used for options which are not synced by Options.ServerOptions
member.param: The option to be queried. Must be of bool type.
member.returns: true if the given option is enabled, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.OptionUtils.IsClientOptionValue``1(Configurable{``0},``0)
member.summary: Directly requests for the client's REMIX options, then compares its values to the provided argument.
member.remarks: This should only be used for options which are not synced by Options.ServerOptions
member.typeparam: The type of the configurable itself.
member.param: The option to be queried.
The expected value to be checked.
member.returns: true if the option's value matches the given argument, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.OptionUtils.GetOptionValue``1(Configurable{``0})
member.summary: Determines if a given option is enabled in the client's REMIX options, or the host's if in an online lobby.
member.remarks: If the client is not in an online lobby, this has the same effect as directly checking the configurable itself.
member.typeparam: The type of the configurable itself.
member.param: The option to be queried.
member.returns: The local value for the given option.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.OptionUtils.IsOptionEnabled(Configurable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Determines if a given option is enabled in the client's REMIX options, or the host's if in an online lobby.
member.remarks: If the client is not in an online lobby, this has the same effect as directly checking the configurable itself.
member.param: The option to be queried. Must be of bool type.
member.returns: The configured value for the given option.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.OptionUtils.IsOptionValue``1(Configurable{``0},``0)
member.summary: Determines if a given option has the provided value in the client's REMIX options, or the host's if in an online lobby.
member.remarks: If the client is not in an online lobby, this has the same effect as directly checking the configurable itself.
member.typeparam: The type of the configurable itself.
member.param: The option to be queried.
The expected value to be checked.
member.returns: true if the option's value matches the given argument, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.OptionUtils.GetOptionValue``1(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the value of the given option from the local SharedOptions property.
member.param: The name of the option to be queried.
member.returns: The value stored in the local SharedOptions property.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.OptionUtils.IsOptionEnabled(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if the local SharedOptions property has the given option enabled.
member.param: The name of the option to be queried.
member.returns: true if the given option is enabled, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.OptionUtils.IsOptionValue``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Determines if the local SharedOptions property has the given option set to the provided value.
member.typeparam: The type of the configurable itself.
member.param: The name of the option to be queried.
The expected value to be checked.
member.returns: true if the option's value matches the given argument, false otherwise.

member.name: T:ModLib.Options.ServerOptions
member.summary: Holds the client's current REMIX options; Provides the ability to override these options, as well as serialize them in an online context.

member.name: F:ModLib.Options.ServerOptions._options
member.summary: Contains the actual option values of the client.

member.name: F:ModLib.Options.ServerOptions._tempOptions
member.summary: Contains the identifiers of overriden option keys, as well as their original values.

member.name: P:ModLib.Options.ServerOptions.MyOptions
member.summary: A read-only view of the local holder of option values.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ServerOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance with an empty local holder.
member.remarks: Note: Consider using for an automatically-managed instance of this class instead.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ServerOptions.#ctor(ModLib.Options.ServerOptions)
member.summary: Creates a new instance with the same held values of the existing instance.
member.remarks: Note: Consider using for an automatically-managed instance of this class instead.
member.param: The source whose values will be copied.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ServerOptions.AddTemporaryOption(System.String,ModLib.Options.ConfigValue,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a temporary option to this instance with the provided key and value.
member.remarks: Temporary options are raw representations of option values; They can be used like any other option key, but are not saved to disk.
member.param: The unique key for identifying the temporary option. If an existing option has the same key, it is overriden.
The value to be saved with the given option key.
If true, this temporary option will be removed the next time is called.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ServerOptions.RemoveTemporaryOption(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a given temporary option from this instance.
member.param: The option key to be removed.
member.returns: true if the option was successfully removed, false otherwise. This method returns false if no temporary option is found with the given key.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ServerOptions.IsTemporaryOption(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if a given option key is temporary or not.
member.param: The option key to be searched.
member.returns: true if the option is temporary, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ServerOptions.RefreshOptions(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the local holder's values to those from the REMIX option interface.
member.param: If true, only temporary options are refreshed, instead of all registered values.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ServerOptions.SetOptions(ModLib.Options.ServerOptions)
member.summary: Sets the local holder's values to those from the given source.
member.param: The source whose values will be copied.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ServerOptions.SetOptions(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,ModLib.Options.ConfigValue})
member.summary: Sets the local holder's values to those from the provided dictionary.
member.param: The dictionary whose values will be copied.

member.name: M:ModLib.Options.ServerOptions.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string containing the ' formatted local values.
member.returns: A string containing the ' formatted local values.

member.name: T:ModLib.Options.ClientOptionAttribute
member.summary: Determines a given REMIX option is not to be synced in an online context (e.g. a Rain Meadow lobby).

member.name: T:ModLib.Registry
member.summary: The entrypoint for registering mods to ModLib.

member.name: P:ModLib.Registry.MyMod
member.summary: Retrieves the registered metadata of the current mod.
member.remarks: If this property is accessed before the mod is registered to ModLib, a is thrown.
member.exception: The current mod assembly was not registered to ModLib.

member.name: P:ModLib.Registry.DefaultLogsPath
member.summary: The default path for log files.

member.name: M:ModLib.Registry.RegisterMod(BepInEx.BaseUnityPlugin,System.Type,BepInEx.Logging.ManualLogSource)
member.summary: Registers the current mod assembly to ModLib. This should be done sometime during the mod-loading process, typically from the Main/Plugin class constructor, Awake() or OnEnable() methods.
member.param: The Plugin class from which this mod is being registered.
A class with public static fields of type , which are retrieved via reflection to determine the mod's REMIX options.
The log source of this mod. If LogUtils is present, a will be created with this parameter as its LogSource value.
member.exception: The current mod assembly is already registered to ModLib.

member.name: M:ModLib.Registry.RegisterMod(BepInEx.BaseUnityPlugin,System.Type,ModLib.Logging.ModLogger)
member.summary: Registers the current mod assembly to ModLib. This should be done sometime during the mod-loading process, typically from the Main/Plugin class constructor, Awake() or OnEnable() methods.
member.param: The Plugin class from which this mod is being registered.
A class with public static fields of type , which are retrieved via reflection to determine the mod's REMIX options.
The wrapped logger for usage by this mod.
member.exception: The current mod assembly is already registered to ModLib.

member.name: M:ModLib.Registry.UnregisterMod
member.summary: Removes the current mod assembly from ModLib's registry.
member.returns: true if the mod was successfully unregistered, false otherwise (e.g. if it was not registered at all).

member.name: M:ModLib.Registry.GetMod(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Retrieves the mod metadata for the given assembly.
member.param: The assembly to be queried.
member.returns: The mod metadata registered for the given assembly.
member.exception: The provided assembly was not registered to ModLib.

member.name: M:ModLib.Registry.RegisterAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly,BepInEx.BepInPlugin,System.Type,ModLib.Logging.ModLogger)
member.summary: Registers the given assembly to ModLib, binding the provided arguments as its metadata.
member.param: The assembly to be registered.
The plugin data for registry.
The option holder class for this mod, if any.
The logger instance for this mod. If null, a new one is created.
member.returns: The newly registered mod entry.
member.exception: The given assembly is already registered to ModLib.

member.name: T:ModLib.Storage.ModPersistentSaveData
member.summary: JSON-serializable data which is retrieved on initialization and stored in a dedicated file on shutdown.

member.name: M:ModLib.Storage.ModPersistentSaveData.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new persistent data for this mod.
member.param: If true, all save slots will share the same data file. Otherwise, each slot has a separate file in its own folder.
If true, ModLib will not automatically save the stored data. Otherwise, the data is stored in a JSON file upon closing the game.

member.name: M:ModLib.Storage.ModPersistentSaveData.GetData(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the stored data with the given key.
member.param: The key to search for.
member.returns: The data associated with the given key.
member.exception: No data was found with the given key.

member.summary: Retrieves the stored data with the given key.
member.typeparam: The type of the data to be retrieved
member.param: The key to search for.
member.returns: The data associated with the given key.
member.exception: No data was found with the given key.
The stored data is not of the given type.

member.name: M:ModLib.Storage.ModPersistentSaveData.HasData(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if the given key has any data associated to it in the persistent data.
member.param: The key to search for.
member.returns: true if any data is bound to the given key, false otherwise. This method returns false if key is null.

member.summary: Attempts to safely retrieve the stored data for the given key.
member.param: The key to search for.
The stored data for the given key.
member.returns: true if valid data was found for the given key, false otherwise. This method returns false if key is null.

The stored data for the given key.
